description: Commissioning Agent - Murray Holland Building Renovations
full_summary:
Title: Commissioning Agent for Murray-Holland Building Renovations
================================================================ryptography Title: Agent de mise en service pour les rénovations du bâtiment Murray-Holland
================================================================datetime Published on 2023-11-17
================================================================datetime Closing date: 2023-12-15 14:00:00
================================================================
Background and Scope
-----------------
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals from eligible firms for the provision of Commissioning Agent services for the Murray-Holland Building Renovation project at the Biotechnology Research Institute (BIO) in Dartmouth, Nova Scotia.

### Recensement Services Sought

- Commissioning Services against Supply Arrangement EB129-180269

Invited Firms
-------------

• CBCL Limited
• EastPoint Engineering Limited
• Integrated Commissioning and Certification
• Ambioner
• Maritech Commissioning Works

Proposal Requirements
-------------------

* Eligible bidders must have a valid qualification in the Province of Nova Scotia
* Proposals must be submitted in either Official Language of Canada
* The Contractor shall be responsible for the commissioning and verification of the building's major systems

Evaluation Criteria
-----------------

* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

Debriefing
----------

Bidders may request a debriefing within 15 working days of receiving notification of an unsuccessful bid. This debriefing will be conducted by the PSPC Contracting Authority.

Additional Information
--------------------

* This project falls under the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

Contact Information
-----------------

* Rachel Miller (elle-la/she-hir)
* rachel.miller@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca (ibrelinne:
 )

### Application and Attachment Details
Submission of the Proposal package outline is NOT available for this solicitation.
